images.description: An array of images' ids in order. Image IDs are matched from context that is most relevant, or 0 if none available

titles.description: An array titles in the same order with the images: Summarized or rephrased titles from the text context

texts.description: Summarized or rephrased text information. In the same order as the images and titles

questions.description: Same number of questions as the length of images, titles and texts. Every questions is an explanation question of that title/text, such as 'What is x?' or 'Who is X?'
